thread.title: Liverpool midfielder wanted on loan by Dinamo
thread.title_full: Liverpool midfielder wanted on loan by Dinamo

title: Liverpool midfielder wanted on loan by Dinamo
text:
Liverpool midfielder wanted on loan by Dinamo 
Date published: Wednesday 15th March 2017 10:20 
Liverpool midfielder Marko Grujic is attracting attention from Croatian league champions Dinamo Zagreb. 
Grujic shone in pre-season for Liverpool but has endured a difficult first campaign at Anfield, his progress being derailed by injuries. 
He featured in two of the club’s first six Premier League games, but his last first-team appearance in any competition came as a stoppage-time substitute against Leeds in the EFL Cup in November. He was one of our top ten forgotten Premier League players . 
The midfielder remains highly-rated however, and Dinamo Zagbreb, who were crowned Prva HNL champions last season and sit second in the table this campaign, have expressed an interest in the 20-year-old. 
“I wanted to bring Andrija Zivkovic in from Benfica for €5million, but I failed,” club adviser Zdravko Mamic told Blic. 
“Now I want to get Marko Grujic from Liverpool on loan.” Share this Page
